msg: We have partnered with two awesome events for AL, ML and chatbot professionals. One is called Chatbot Summit and will be held in BERLIN on 26th of June. Now can offer you 30% discount. Visit their website at http://bit.ly/chatbotsummit and use the promo code STANDUPLYBOTS in order to get it.
slackbot6's url: [CHATBOT SUMMIT | Berlin, June 26th | Home of the Chatbot Revolution]
The other one is AL ML World 2017 - in LONDON on 13-15 of June, we offer you 20% discount. Same thing - visit their vebsite at http://bit.ly/aimlworld2017 and use promocode STANDUPLY
I hope that this information will reach the right people :slightly_smiling_face:
